channel.title: Duel arena PI
channel.description: duel arena doesnt show a option to challenge :S

item.title: Duel arena PI
item.dc:creator: @williams15 williams15
item.description:
@williams15 wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:7, topic:555454”][quote author=williams15 link=topic=674662.msg4508965#msg4508965 date=1464184226]

https://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs-503-client-server/requests/471676-re-enable-duel-arena-challenge-option.html#post3859256

Basically it’s that, but replace “Attack” with “Challenge”

// getPA().showOption(3, 0, "Challenge", 1); //}

got that in client.java but that was already in there how can i turn it on?

Remove the comment.
// in java is a comment. Any text after it will be ignored by the compiler.

comment being }?
[/quote]
No, that’s an end-bracket. A single line comment starts with 2 forward slashes.
// Like this.[/quote]
still hasnt worked

Read full topic

item.title: Duel arena PI
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“williams15, post:5, topic:555454”][quote author=sk8rdude461 link=topic=674662.msg4508943#msg4508943 date=1464110338]

https://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs-503-client-server/requests/471676-re-enable-duel-arena-challenge-option.html#post3859256

Basically it’s that, but replace “Attack” with “Challenge”

// getPA().showOption(3, 0, "Challenge", 1); //}

got that in client.java but that was already in there how can i turn it on?

Remove the comment.
// in java is a comment. Any text after it will be ignored by the compiler.
[/quote]

comment being }?[/quote]
No, that’s an end-bracket. A single line comment starts with 2 forward slashes.
// Like this.

Read full topic
